text: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex* (*But Were Afraid to Ask) is a 1972 American comedy movie directed by Woody Allen (who also stars) and based on the 1969 novel of the same name by David Reuben. It also stars John Carradine, Lou Jacobi, Burt Reynolds, Lynn Redgrave, Tony Randall, Anthony Quayle and Gene Wilder and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Movies based on books Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1972 LGBT movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Cross-dressing in movies Category:Movies about mammals
title:
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex* (*But Were Afraid to Ask)
(movie)
